job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
• Bachelors degree and higher
  • Core DS & ML Model skill set
  • AWS Cloud Preferred
  • Python Programming along with Flask (or similar to Flask modules)
  • Be able to share & showcase gitHub code if they have any
  • Be able to create and deploy models and create webApps or something else where business users will know how to use these models for their business purpose
  • Shiny with R capabilities (Optional)
  • Supply Chain management experience (Optional, but good to have)
  • CI/CD,gitHub/BitBucket,Jenkins
  • SQL skillet

Experience should be : 5+
